string.name: name
string.value: The Culprit is in the Dungeon
Did she find out who stole the #t4032464#? Ask #b#p1052103##k in #b#m103000000##k.
#p1052103# says that the culprit is in the Dungeon and that the culprit's hideout is inside #b#m105070300##k. She wants you to go inside, catch the thief, and restore #m103000000#'s honor.
The dungeon where the thief was supposed to be was quiet. There were no people, only a strange puppet... Could this puppet be the culprit?

Hm, good. I found the suspect! The culprit is in the dungeon. According to the document, the culprit who stole the document was seen heading towards #m105070300#. There must be a hideout somewhere near there.
A puppet stole the herbs? Ha. That makes no sense! I suppose that's not important.
Anyway, the culprit's hideout must be in Sleepy Dungeon #b#m105070300##k! Go catch the culprit! Please recover the honorable name of #m103000000#!
The culrpit is in the dungeon! That's something I've been wanting to say for a long time now, haha.
What? You've accused the people of #m103000000# and now you refuse to help? Where is your heart, huh?
...\r\n#b#L0#(An ugly wooden puppet that's broken and worn out lies on the floor. There is nothing else here. Could the culprit have gone somewhere?)#l\n#k
...\r\n#b#L0#(Anyway, this is the ugliest puppet ever. Who could have brought this ugly thing here?)#l\n#k
(Flinch)\r\n#b#L0#(Hm? The puppet flinched. Was that your imagination? Go over and give it a nudge.)#l\n#k
Yikes! Don't touch me!\r\n#b#L0#(The puppet talks!)#l\n#k
Intruder! How dare you enter my master's cave and try to steal me! I will not forgive you for this! But don't hit me. I can't fight. I'm not a battle puppet.
Haven't you gone to catch the culprit yet? I'm telling you that the culprit's hideout is in #b#m105070300##k inside the Sleepy Dungeon.
